name: 鄭以旋
objective: This course teaches relevant and up-to-date business topics such as finance, globalization, start-ups, marketing, logistics, risk management and business ethics (e.g. fair trade). We will also read foundational literature on economics to familiarize students with basic concepts in commerce and business. Lastly, students will be taught practical business English skills in writing and speaking.

Assessment:
Mid-term* 　　　　　　　　　　25%
Final exam* 　　　　　　　　　　35%
Group presentation　　　　　　　　30%

* At the lecturer’s sole discretion, a make-up Mid-term or Final exam may be granted upon presentation of a valid proof of illness (medical certificate or record of hospitalization) within 10 days of the date of absence.
